duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage dedicated email inbox, prioritize, client requests, case and implement eligible items.
Create a case/package for tracking, monitoring, and E2E resolution as applicable.
Receive and respond to implementation requests received by email and questions from internal partners.
Conduct limited research and respond to clients and be able to answer questions and inquiries.
Utilize various bank systems to support clients' requests.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business Administration, or a related field
